      • checkZoomed

        private void checkZoomed(Canvas canvas)
        Checks of the viewport is zoomed in. If the zoomfactor is not equal to 1.0 then canvas is allowed to zoom in.
        Parameters:
        canvas -

      • drawBackground

        private void drawBackground(Canvas canvas)
        Draws the background image of the game.
        Parameters:
